name: Maintenance (Spidermanfan244)
description:
You work at a power plant and your goal is to ensure the plant doesn't overheat and explode, and more importantly, you don't get fired.

The game is missing a lot of things, like background music, but take this to mean you can fill in those gaps however you want!

(My recommendation for background music is this though: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JzEGOr7DXgI)

Have fun!
